item.description:
This month, The Greater New Haven Design and Marketing Meetup Group is pleased to present John Follis on "Blogs, Podcasts and the New Marketing Landscape"

We will discuss some of these interesting topics:

  • What is a blog, how to create one and how it can help your business
  • What is a podcast and how to use them
  • What is "G-Cred" and why your business had better have it


John Follis has recently returned to CT after 25-years in New York where he co-founded one of Madison Avenue's most award-winning agencies: Follis DeVito Verdi. He was also named "One of New York's 12 Best" by The New York Ad Club. More recently, John has become a national authority on Web 2.0 marketing and Social Media.
He is a contributing columnist on the topic for ADWEEK, the author of The Follis Marketing Report blog: http://www.TheFollisR... and host of his Top 20 marketing podcast called The Marketing Show: http://www.TheMarketi...

Please RSVP so we know how many people to expect. Thanks!!
